Title: Joshikausei
Description: ['Momoko Futo is an average high-school girl going about her everyday life. Though laid-back and cheerful, her life is anything but mundane as her eccentricity and clumsiness never fail to spice up her days. Her two best friends are always with her: the cute and innocent Mayumi Furui, and the calm and cool Shibumi Shibusawa. Without any spoken dialogue or narration, ', Joshikausei, ' aims to recount the comedic shenanigans these girls get up to through the expressive sounds and gestures that they make.', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' [Written by MAL Rewrite]', ' ', ' ']
Staff: [['Sasaki, Tokihiro', 'Director, Series Composition'], ['Nagasaki, Yukio', 'Sound Director'], ['Horikawa, Kazuto', 'Editing, Director of Photography'], ['Wakai, Ken', 'Original Creator']]
